body.p:
Legacy Vertiv (Liebert) RPP is shown at right.
Disconnect power output cables to load (busway) from the RPP Output Bus Bars outlined by the red rectangle. (You will later reconnect them to the load output of the Retrofit Bypass Cabinet.)
(4) 2/0 cables (ABCN) with compression lugs are already attached to the input of the Retrofit Bypass Cabinet RPP Switch.
(1) #2 AWG Ground cable is coiled and attached to the Output (Busway) ground bus in the Retrofit Bypass Cabinet.
The cables are pre-cut to the correct length.
Run the (5) cables through side panel glastic holes to the Vertiv RPP. Use the front set of glastic holes.
Attach the ABCN cables to RPP output bus bars (red rectangle).
Attach the Ground wire to the Vertiv ground connection (yellow wire connection).
Torque for ½”-13 bolts is 57 ft-lbs.
Torque for M12 bolts is 77 Nm.
